concept.title: Getting started with Sametime Meetings Add-in for Outlook
concept.shortdesc: The Sametime Meetings add-in allows you to add a Sametime meeting room to an Outlook meeting invitation.

conbody.p: The Sametime Meeting add-in is included when installing the Sametime Meeting. It can be installed into your Outlook environment either by URL or file. After the add-in is installed, you can add a Sametime Meeting room to a meeting invitation.
